channel.title: Trading with NPC
channel.description:
Hi
Sugmund the merchant is hosting a shop of mine but when you click trade he dont open shop, only when u click talk
How do i make it so trade opens shop?
Thanks
Bye

item.title: Trading with NPC
item.dc:creator: @i_code_rsps i code rsps
item.description:
@i_code_rsps wrote:

For Delta:

Find this in client.java

case 17: // second Click npc

If you can’t find this just find

case 17:

Scroll down a bit and you should see

if(NPCID == 534){

It’ll be along those lines, then under the last }

Paste this in.

if(NPCID == ####){ PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = &&; }

Key:
####= The npc you want to be able to trade
&&= Shop id

Read full topic
